thread.title: Global Welding Consumables Market 2015-2019 - With Bohler W
thread.title_full: Global Welding Consumables Market 2015-2019 - With Bohler W

author: Research and Markets
title: Global Welding Consumables Market 2015-2019 - With Bohler W
text:
DUBLIN , Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Research and Markets( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/5w8g4q/global_welding ) has announced the addition of the "Global Welding Consumables Market 2015-2019" report to their offering.
The key trends to follow during this period would be the new technologies being developed in the industry, especially those designed to weld thick metal joints. In addition, the industry is accepting automation at different stages in welding, and we foresee the development of automation software and robots as viable trends that will influence the industry in the forecast period.

According to the report, one of the primary drivers in the global welding consumables market is the surge in construction activities across the globe.

Further, the report states that the slow adoption of advanced technologies, especially in developing countries, poses a challenge to the market.

The report covers the current scenario and the growth prospects of the global welding consumables market for the period of 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated through the sale of welding consumables. 

The report covers the Americas, APAC, Europe , and MENA; it also covers the landscape of the global welding consumables market and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.

Key vendors
